entry.content:
It's possible to string together web services - like WordPress, Twitter, Facebook, Gmail, Tumblr, Evernote, etc. - using If This Then That (IFTTT for short).

In IFTTT, you create Recipes, each of which consists of a Trigger, and an Action. Whenever you do something that is a Trigger for one of your Recipes (like publishing a new WordPress blog post for example), then the associated Action (such as tweeting the link to the blog post) is automatically performed for you.

I've added a pre-existing recipe to my IFTTT account that does exactly that, and this blog entry is to test it.
